doc.field: VALERO ENERGY VLO> DEBT UPGRADED BY MOODY'S

Moody's Investors Service Inc said it upgraded Valero Energy Corp's 120 mln dlrs of debt. Moody's cited an improved leverage position that will result from Valero's sale of its Valero Natural Gas subsidiary to Valero Natural Gas Partners L.P., the partial sale of units of that partnership to the public, and the simultaneous sale of first mortgage bonds to institutional investors. Raised were Valero-backed tax-exempt economic development revenue bonds of Vincennes, Ind, to Baa-3 from B-1, Valero's subordinated debt to Ba-1 from B-2 and depository preferred stock to Ba-1 from B-2. Reuter
